conbody.p: Some people may prefer using FastCGI for deployment. In this case, you'll need to add an extra tool to the mix. FastCGI works by receiving new connection from a file descriptor. The C library assumes that this file descriptor will be 0 (standard input), so you need to use the spawn-fcgi program to bind your aplication's standard input to the correct socket.
